segments.text: I've heard of ground-level ozone but can you explain what it is exactly ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it's one of the main air pollutants . Factories don't emit it directly into the air . It's actually formed when nitrogen oxides and VOC emissions come into contact with heat and sunlight .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sorry ? What does VOC stand for ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , Vous are ' volatile organic compounds ' . That's a technical term for solvents or other chemicals found in things like paint .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , what damage does ozone do to the environment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it can cause smog , which can affect people's health - especially people with breathing difficulties .
segments.speaker: S2
